page.title: 03A FAMILY GROCER'S
page.content: Hodgsons Grocer's is situated at the top end of Cononley and is a family business. We interviewed the proprietor to find out about local trade. The shop receives just local trade which has been increased with the building of new flats and maisonettes opposite the shop. The shop trades between 8.30am and 6.00pm on Mondays, Tuesdays, Wednesdays and Fridays and between 8.30 and 12.00 noon on Thursdays and Saturdays and is closed on Sundays. Having only its bread and dairy produce delivered the proprietors have to visit a cash and carry once a week for all other goods.The shop makes up and delivers orders which is a fast declining asset.The present owners have been there for 32 years and have been constantly in competition with the Co_op.
